Virtual Brain LabÔÉÅ

The Virtual Brain Lab builds intuitive and interactive 3D visualizations for neuroscience.

The VBL is located within the Steinmetz Lab at the University of Washington and many of our projects are collaborations with the International Brain Laboratory.

Please see the individual projects for installation instructions and documentation!
